abbreviation.description: A short form or code representing the sales tax.

createdAt.description: When the sales tax was created.

description.description: User defined description for the sales tax.

id.description: The unique identifier for the sales tax.

isArchived.description: Is the sales tax hidden from view by default.

isCompound.description: Is a compound tax, or stacked tax. This tax is calculated on top of the subtotal and other tax amounts.

isRecoverable.description: Is a recoverable tax. It is recoverable if you can deduct the tax that you as a business paid from the tax that you have collected.

modifiedAt.description: When the sales tax was last modified.

rate.description: Tax rate effective on 'for' date, or current date if no parameter, as a decimal (e.g. 0.15 represents 15%).

effective.description: Date from which the sales tax rate applies.

rate.description: Tax rate applying from the effective date as a decimal (e.g. 0.15 represents 15%).

showTaxNumberOnInvoices.description: Display tax number beside the tax name on an invoice.

taxNumber.description: The tax's issued identification number from a taxing authority.
